column1: #Text=Main Asami Sato Bolin Bumi Mako Ikki Korra Kya Tenzin Tonraq Varrick Antagonists Hotah Northern Water Tribe military Unalaq says : " Minor Eska Jinora Meelo Naga Pabu Pema Senna Southern Water Tribe rebels Zhu Li " Shiro Shinobi says : " Avatar Korra has lost her memory !
#Text=She is connecting with her deepest Avatar memories .
#Text=She must confront her own past if she is to move forward .
#Text=We can only hope that she survives her ordeal .
#Text=" Raava says : " The human and spirit realms are headed toward annihilation .
#Text=This is why humans have no place interfering in the business of spirits .
#Text=" Wan says : " This world is home to all of us , and what happens here is everyone 's business .
#Text=" Raava says : " Thanks to you , this world may cease to exist !
#Text=I only hope I can track down Vaatu before it 's too late .
#Text=" Wan says : " Let me help you .
#Text=" Raava says : " I do n't want your help .
#Text=Do n't interfere with me again , human !
